title: 5 Easy Steps to Reset VLC Media Player

steps.title: Launch VLC Media Player on your computer.
steps.content: Launch VLC Media Player on your computer. Search for VLC in the Start menu to find it easily. Alternatively, you open a media file with VLC Player.

steps.title: Navigate to the Tools option.
steps.content: Navigate to the Tools option. Click on the Tools from the top menu bar. You'll see a drop-down menu after doing so.

steps.title: Select Preferences from the drop-down menu.
steps.content: Select Preferences from the drop-down menu. You can quickly access this Preferences option by pressing Ctrl + P on your keyboard.

steps.title: Click on the Reset Preferences button.
steps.content: Click on the Reset Preferences button. It will be located at the bottom of the newly opened Preferences box.

steps.title: Confirm your action.
steps.content: Confirm your action. Click on the OK button from the confirmation prompt. This will reset your VLC Player to its default settings. Finished!
